scripts.prisma:test:sqlite: dotenv -e examples/prisma-stress-test/prisma/.env.sqlite -- npx prisma db push --schema=examples/prisma-stress-test/prisma/schema.sqlite.prisma --force-reset --accept-data-loss && dotenv -e examples/prisma-stress-test/prisma/.env.sqlite -- npx ts-node examples/prisma-stress-test/seed.ts
scripts.prisma:test:postgres: dotenv -e examples/prisma-stress-test/prisma/.env.postgres -- npx prisma db push --schema=examples/prisma-stress-test/prisma/schema.postgres.prisma --force-reset --accept-data-loss && dotenv -e examples/prisma-stress-test/prisma/.env.postgres -- npx ts-node examples/prisma-stress-test/seed.ts
scripts.prisma:test:mysql: dotenv -e examples/prisma-stress-test/prisma/.env.mysql -- npx prisma db push --schema=examples/prisma-stress-test/prisma/schema.mysql.prisma --force-reset --accept-data-loss && dotenv -e examples/prisma-stress-test/prisma/.env.mysql -- npx ts-node examples/prisma-stress-test/seed.ts
scripts.drizzle:test:sqlite: dotenv -e examples/drizzle-stress-test/.env.sqlite -- sqlite3 examples/drizzle-stress-test/stress.db < examples/drizzle-stress-test/migrations/sqlite.sql && dotenv -e examples/drizzle-stress-test/.env.sqlite -- npx ts-node examples/drizzle-stress-test/seed.ts
scripts.drizzle:test:postgres: dotenv -e examples/drizzle-stress-test/.env.postgres -- bash -c 'psql "$DATABASE_URL" -f examples/drizzle-stress-test/migrations/postgres.sql' && dotenv -e examples/drizzle-stress-test/.env.postgres -- npx ts-node examples/drizzle-stress-test/seed.ts
scripts.drizzle:test:mysql: dotenv -e examples/drizzle-stress-test/.env.mysql -- bash -c 'docker exec -i quickseed-mariadb mariadb -u$DB_USER -p$DB_PASSWORD $DB_NAME < examples/drizzle-stress-test/migrations/mysql.sql' && dotenv -e examples/drizzle-stress-test/.env.mysql -- npx ts-node examples/drizzle-stress-test/seed.ts
